name: Mutants (itch) (DevError)
description:
All of your Crewmates  mutated but sadly you can't cure it, so kill them all. But killing them lets you modify yourself to unlock powerful skills.

Movement - WASD
Jump            - Space

We do not recommend the web version.

In case  you can't see hearts or the menu is buggy - the HTML5 version has a problem with playing in your browser.
